config_description: Enables SASI index creation on this node. SASI indexes are considered experimental and are not recommended for production use.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'enable_sasi_indexes' configuration option is used to enable the creation of SASI indexes in the system. The code checks if the configuration is enabled in the cassandra.yaml file before allowing the creation of SASI indexes.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'enable_sasi_indexes' configuration is dependent on when the 'apply' method is called in the system. This could vary based on the frequency of schema changes or index creations in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling the 'enable_sasi_indexes' configuration option allows for the creation of SASI indexes, which can impact the system performance and resource usage. SASI indexes are experimental and not recommended for production use, so enabling this configuration may introduce instability or unexpected behavior in the system.
